bio.aboutMe: Statistical and Computer Engineer with more than 12 years of experience in software development, creating and providing solutions for large companies, always seeking excellence and teamwork. Currently, I am dedicated to web development (JavaScript, React, Next.js, Node.js), mostly front-end.

cv.resume: Born on 05/05/1984, in Lima, Peru. Peruvian resident in Guayaquil.

experience05.description: Redesign of the Quantify 360 Solutions site.

experience04.description: Analysis, development and backend support (C, Oracle PL/SQL, Linux). Featured: process optimization for the technical area of Enel Perú (2019).

experience03.description: Development for POS (Ingenico C/C++, Android). Remittance and security implementations at Interbank Agente and insurance acquisition for GCS (Dominican Republic).

experience02.description: Development of EFT systems (C, Oracle PL/SQL). Featured: Banca Móvil BBVA-Telefónica (2013).

experience01.description: Videogames (Visual C++) at casinoval.com: 101 Lions, Wild Cleopatra, etc.

education01.description: Bs. Sc. at Statistical Engineering and Computer Science.

preferredStack.title: Preferred stack
preferredStack.desc: Any stack that has Next.js as frontend or full stack.

music.title: Music
music.paragraph: I like to play string instruments: bass and guitar, especially the first one.
